name: Survive The Demon Lord's Chaos... or not.
name_original: Survive The Demon Lord's Chaos... or not.
description:
PLAY GAME IN FULL SCREEN MODE

Press the full screen button at the most right corner of the game panel. (You might have to scroll right a bit)

Survive the Demon Lord's Chaos... or not?

A top-down shooter game that allows you to build obstacles and juke enemies. You can build obstacles and build mazes. Build maze by building obstacles. The enemy cannot walk through one unit of space (the size of player). Best of luck.

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Click (hold) - To shoot

Space bar - (hold) Block Placement Dummy (release) Build obstacle

WASD - Movement
